question_text:
Question 39. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MCQ (2M)
Question ID : 8232513138
For a statement S in a program, in the context of liveness analysis, the following sets are defined:
USE(S): the set of variables used in S
IN (S): the set of variables that are live at the entry of S
OUT(S): the set of variables that are live at the exit of S
Consider a basic block that consists of two statements. S
1
 followed by S
2
.
Which one of the following statements is correct?
S1
Out (51)
In (52)
S2
Which of the following is true?
(A) Out (S1) = In (S2) U Use (S2)
(B) Out (S1) = In (S2) n Use (S2)
(C) Out (S1) = In (S2)
(D) Out(S1)= ln(S1)U Use(S1)
